data.title: IMF Warns Stablecoins Pose Financial Stability Risks as Cross-Border Flows Surpass Bitcoin and Ethereum
data.description: IMF warns as stablecoin flows surpass BTC and ETH, raising global financial stability and dollarization risks.
data.keywords: emerging markets, digital dollars, Ethereum, Tether, IMF data, Stablecoins, The Fund, digital dollar, financial system, crypto assets, USD Coin, capital flows
